about_the_game:
Take a trip with a modern twist of vintage glamour in our newest DLC: Swanky Song Pack! Enjoy the vibes with 5 sassy songs by Laura Leighe.

This pack’s choreography is a collaboration with OkDisplay, with a range of difficulties, including Cardio levels by Coopalooper, for a total of 20 NEW TRIPS.

It’s time to put on your VR headset and get ready to let your swanky, groovy state of mind take over on the dance floor as you catch gems, ride ribbons, smash drums and gracefully dodge barriers, in the most elegant and luxurious style.

This DLC follows in the footsteps of the original success of Audio Trip VR and it is the first major addition to gameplay after its Full Release in December of 2022. It continues to offer an unparalleled audio-visual experience that combines rhythm, dance, and fitness.

So tap into your swanky side, and let yourself be transported to the world of Audio Trip VR. It’s time to hit the dance floor and let your vibrant, golden, superstar dancer self shine through.
